main event: A ball-shaped object was sighted near Macon, Georgia on August 6, 1965, which departed at a high rate of speed.
interesting points: The object was described as ball-shaped and amber in color,Estimated to be 20-30 feet in diameter at 10,000 feet distance,Two witnesses reported that the object was not a known aircraft,The object did not produce any sound and had no visible markings,The sighting lasted approximately five minutes before the object vanished.
witness description: Mr. and Mrs. Crawley, and the Torres and Meacham visiting from Tampa, Florida.
